alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 7:23PM MST until January 07 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Peck, Clarkston, Pomeroy, Winchester, Mohler, Nezperce, Waha, Craigmont, Gifford, Kamiah, Clarkston Heights, Lapwai, Mansfield, Palisades, Waterville, Culdesac, and Lewiston. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
